exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : 2 <= p power_nzero : forall x : nat, power x p <> 0 a, b, c : nat H1 : a < b H2 : b < c Unable to unify "2 <= ?M1529 + ?M1530" with "S (b - a - 1) <= c - a - 1".

original: intros [H1 H2]. apply (Nat.lt_sub_lt_add_r 1). simpl. rewrite Nat.add_sub. apply (Nat.lt_trans _ b + 1 _). - apply (Nat.lt_succ_r _ b). apply H1. - apply H2.
